Name: [Duel] Inflatable Hammer
Desc: Increases the stack limit of Rush from 4 to <color=#2BAD00>8</color>. Stunned enemies' Stun DMG Multiplier increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.
Desc2: Don't be fooled by the text "1000T" written on this hammer... It's only meant to scare people. It is in fact, just a flimsy hammer that will make a funny toy sound when it hits anything.
